attributes.additional_details: This is because to support Ukraine, the government needs money and to support Ukraine, the cost of living and bills have rocketed high. The people who are on benefits are struggling to live.
attributes.background: I believe that the government should withdraw the support that they are giving to Ukraine in the war against Russia.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/628549
